title: Oxidative potential of fine particulate matter emitted from traditional and improved biomass cookstoves
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,202-213
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00135K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bradley H. Isenor, Jillian P. Downey, Samuel A. Whidden, Megan M. Fitzgerald, Jenny P. S. Wong
Reduced PM2.5 emissions from improved cookstoves do not necessarily equate to reduced exposure to toxic PM2.5, due to changes in PM2.5 chemical composition and toxic potency.
